lead_paragraph: On Saturday night, Winky Wright (50-3, with 25 knockouts) will challenge the undefeated Jermain Taylor (25-0, 17 knockouts) for Taylor's undisputed middleweight championship.
snippet: On Saturday night, Winky Wright (50-3, with 25 knockouts) will challenge the undefeated Jermain Taylor (25-0, 17 knockouts) for Taylor's undisputed middleweight championship.
